title: Can I please stop having monkeys in my team
body:
No more irons. No more newbies. No more 33% winrate monkeys. Just a fair game thanks, thats all i ask for.

Thanks Riot.

replies.body: 8 games in a row now there has been an iron player in a silver mmr game. Please fix.
And talking about the sort of players with less than 20% winrates. Cmon this is getting stupid.
